name: Do not bother your sister
description:
Submission

made in 3 hours for Trijam 157. Theme: The angriest protagonist

Team

Jinxi: Programming (& previously produced artwork)

Miguel Neves: Sound Design and Composing

Controls

Mouse only

Objective

Try to solve the 7 puzzles to get your mom angry. Let us know in the comments which ones you got.

Assets

Inspired by Kenny's 1 Bit Assets. Other than that only our own creations
